Uses of Class
com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.servlet.WServlet

  • Packages that use WServlet 
    Package Description
    com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.lde
    Provides the ability to running a WComponent application in a Servlet container directly from any development environment.
    com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.lde.examples
    Contains a Hello World Servlet example.
    com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.servlet
    Provides support for running a WComponent application in a Servlet container.
    com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.test.selenium
    Provides a WComponent UI testing API using the Selenium 2.0 WebDriver framework.

    • Uses of WServlet in com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.lde

      Subclasses of WServlet in com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.lde 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PlainLauncher
      This class enables easy running of a shared WComponent instance in a Jetty servlet container for development and testing purposes.
      static class  StandaloneLauncher.MyLauncher
      Extension of PlainLauncher to make getUrl() public.
      class  TestServlet
      Enables WComponents to be run in a LDE environment.
